ygData.subject: Re: What to do with a level 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At L24 I was still playing in Unrest and getting exp but I understand it s a lot more crowded now than back when I used to play there. Mistmoore should
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Sep 20/99, kbachman <kbachman@...> wrote:
>
> Does anyone have any suggestions about where to go to earn solo
> experience at my level (24)? Does anyone have any tactical suggestions
> to permit me to keep my butt alive when grouped with mediocre players?
>

At L24 I was still playing in Unrest and getting exp but I understand
it's a lot more crowded now than back when I used to play there.
Mistmoore should also give reasonable exp at your level from what I
hear. Permafrost as well. Unfortunately all these areas need a _good_
party to play with. I'd say your chances of finding a good cleric to
work with would be best in Unrest.

Oh, and the aviak village might be another possibility. It looks like
the some of the mobs there should still give exp at 24.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
